title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items sector, the column icons are not displayed.
EB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the software and go to the Available Items sector. 
2. Connect to a Derby database. 
3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon. 
4. Verify whether the table icons and column icons show up.
